edu.cuny.ai.learning
Class WidrowHoffLearner

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.ai.learning.AbstractLearner
      edu.cuny.ai.learning.WidrowHoffLearner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContinuousLearner, Learner, MimicryLearner, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum
public class WidrowHoffLearner
extends AbstractLearner
implements MimicryLearner, Prototypeable, java.io.Serializable

An implementation of the Widrow-Hoff learning algorithm for 1-dimensional training sets.

Parameters

base.learningrate
double (0, 1] (0.85 by default)		 (rate of learning)

Default Base

widrowhoff_learner

Version:
$Revision: 1.18 $
Author:
Steve Phelps

getLearningDelta

public double getLearningDelta()
Description copied from interface: Learner
Return a value indicative of the amount of learning that occured during the last iteration. Values close to 0.0 indicate that the learner has converged to an equilibrium status.

Specified by:
getLearningDelta in interface Learner
Specified by:
getLearningDelta in class AbstractLearner

A double representing the amount of learning that occured.
